thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Stentys Launches a 11.8 Million Euro Rights Issue

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Stentys Launches a 11.8 Million Euro Rights Issue
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - STENTYS SA:
* LAUNCHES A €11.8 MILLION RIGHTS ISSUE TO FINANCE THE ACQUISITION OF MINVASYS
* SUBSCRIPTION RATIO: 13 NEW SHARES FOR 28 EXISTING SHARES * SUBSCRIPTION PRICE: €1.42 PER SHARE, I.E. A DISCOUNT OF 30.39%
* DETACHMENT OF PREEMPTIVE RIGHTS ON FEBRUARY 23, 2018 – SUBSCRIPTION PERIOD FROM FEBRUARY 27 TO MARCH 8, 2018
* SUBSCRIPTION COMMITMENTS OF €8.9 MILLION, REPRESENTING 75.15% OF THE PLANNED CAPITAL INCREASE, FROM A NUMBER OF INVESTORS, INCLUDING BPIFRANCE
Source text: bit.ly/2FhQdiX
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
